概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

android.database
类 ContentObserver

java.lang.Object
  android.database.ContentObserver

public abstract class ContentObserver
extends Object

Receives call backs for changes to content. Must be implemented by objects which are added to a ContentObservable.

构造方法摘要
ContentObserver(Handler handler)
          onChange() will happen on the provider Handler.
 
方法摘要
 boolean deliverSelfNotifications()
          Returns true if this observer is interested in notifications for changes made through the cursor the observer is registered with.
 void dispatchChange(boolean selfChange)
           
 IContentObserver getContentObserver()
          Gets access to the binder transport object.
 void onChange(boolean selfChange)
          This method is called when a change occurs to the cursor that is being observed.
 IContentObserver releaseContentObserver()
          Gets access to the binder transport object, and unlinks the transport object from the ContentObserver.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

构造方法详细信息

ContentObserver

public ContentObserver(Handler handler)
onChange() will happen on the provider Handler.

参数：
handler - The handler to run onChange(boolean) on.
方法详细信息

getContentObserver

public IContentObserver getContentObserver()
Gets access to the binder transport object. Not for public consumption.

releaseContentObserver

public IContentObserver releaseContentObserver()
Gets access to the binder transport object, and unlinks the transport object from the ContentObserver. Not for public consumption.

deliverSelfNotifications

public boolean deliverSelfNotifications()
Returns true if this observer is interested in notifications for changes made through the cursor the observer is registered with.

onChange

public void onChange(boolean selfChange)
This method is called when a change occurs to the cursor that is being observed.

参数：
selfChange - true if the update was caused by a call to commit on the cursor that is being observed.

dispatchChange

public final void dispatchChange(boolean selfChange)
